definition: having a wavy margin and rippled surface, increase and decrease in volume or pitch, as if in waves
details:
adjective
- having a wavy margin and rippled surface
verb
- increase and decrease in volume or pitch, as if in waves
= example: increase and decrease in volume or pitch, as if in waves
- move in a wavy pattern or with a rising and falling motion
= example: move in a wavy pattern or with a rising and falling motion
= synonyms: roll
- stir up (water) so as to form ripples
= synonyms: riffle
- occur in soft rounded shapes
= synonyms: roll
